name: AI Power Grid
description: The AI Power Grid (AIPG) project is a groundbreaking initiative aimed at democratizing open-source and local generative AI. AIPG incentivizes a global network of worker nodes to host and process AI workloads. This not only enhances the accessibility of cutting-edge AI technologies but also fosters a more collaborative and inclusive AI development ecosystem. The project envisions a future where AI advancements are shared openly to benefit human creativity and productivity on a global scale.
